0FDE5DCB4E2A5ABD1A8C9C980CD2B1F9: Find me in the land of The Ninja.
6547F66243718E977A9337B78FF86725: Firey rollers whose scorching shells are highly prized by the Ninja. Drawn to the heat of the sun, these creatures can often be found during the day.
CBEC4BD8487F0D04DC2C23982E24F8BA: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the elements locked within.
